title: The Peaceful Protector: The Adventures of David Jackson
summary: David Jackson, a 57-year-old counselor and editor, discovers his ability to soothe emotional turmoil. Throughout one week, he uses his newfound powers to resolve conflicts and spread peace in his community.
summaryGerman: David Jackson, ein 57-jähriger Berater und Redakteur, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, emotionale Unruhen zu beruhigen. Im Laufe einer Woche nutzt er seine neu entdeckten Kräfte, um Konflikte zu lösen und Frieden in seiner Gemeinde zu verbreiten.
summaryDutch: David Jackson, een 57-jarige counselor en redacteur, ontdekt zijn vermogen om emotionele onrust te kalmeren. Gedurende één week gebruikt hij zijn nieuw gevonden krachten om conflicten op te lossen en vrede te verspreiden in zijn gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: David Jackson, un conseiller et rédacteur de 57 ans, découvre sa capacité à apaiser les troubles émotionnels. Tout au long d'une semaine, il utilise ses pouvoirs nouvellement découverts pour résoudre des conflits et répandre la paix dans sa communauté.

story.text: Upon waking up, David felt an unusual calmness that spread through his body like a warm wave, infusing him with a gentle but strong energy.
During a counseling session, David noticed he could literally absorb the emotional stress of his clients, leaving them visibly relaxed and at peace.
David spent the day editing a particularly contentious novel, but used his soothing powers to resolve the underlying anger in the manuscript's narrative, making it more harmonious.
While walking through the park, David unconsciously calmed a heated argument between two strangers. They parted with smiles, much to his surprise.
David organized a community gathering to spread his message of understanding and tranquility. The event was a heartwarming success.
Feeling the strain of using his powers so intensely, David had a quiet day at home, reflecting on the impact he had made.
As news of his deeds spread, many sought his guidance. David realized that this was just the beginning of his journey as a guardian of peace.

moral: Using one's unique gifts to foster peace and understanding can make a significant impact on the community.
ending: And so, David Jackson's quiet week of profound interventions marked the start of his legacy as the Peaceful Protector.
